html:
Nov 17 (Reuters) - Amazon.com Inc AMZN.O will stop accepting payments made using Visa Inc V.N credit cards issued in the United Kingdom starting next year, Bloomberg News reported on Wednesday.



(Reporting by Bhargav Acharya in Bengaluru; Editing by Subhranshu Sahu)

(( Bhargav.Acharya@thomsonreuters.com ;))

Keywords: BRITAIN-AMAZON.COM/VISA (URGENT)
